narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Chester Sokolowski is a Dentist provider based in Orange, CT. From 2018-06 through 2019-07, this provider received $75K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 326 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 86% of billing is concentrated in D9223 (D9223), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending more than doubled from $22K in 2018 to $53K in 2019 (140% growth).
Billing stopped in 2019-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
